origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_expenses', 'description': 'This function analyzes the actual expenses of a company over a specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyID', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The unique identifier of the company.'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The period for which the expenses are to be analyzed, e.g., 2022.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'expenseAnalysis', 'description': 'The detailed analysis of the company's expenses including trends and key items.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_expenses, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyID'是'ABC123', 'period'是'2022'.
